title: Champion select freezing, demoted again, etc...
body: Apparently it is a fairly common issue, but I cannot find any help for it on the support page and have not heard back after submitting a ticket with the recommended log files. Basically, in champion select the countdown for ban or pick goes to zero, i can still chat with people but eventually my turn to pick/ban comes around and I cannot select anything. I am getting 30 minute penalties now everytime that happens. I have seen many people post about this, I do not know why it has not been fixed/there is no help on the support page for this. Thanks

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I recommend waiting for a tech team member to get back to you. Because you've provided logs, the tech specialist will have a lot more context as to what could specifically be causing the problem.

Let me know if you have any questions.
